sentence.Network_en: Claire worked to beautify the garden.
The City Council has a manifold plan to beautify the city.
sentence.Network_cn: 市政府制定了一个美化城市的多重规化.

sentence.Network_en: We should spare no effort to beautify our environment.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们应该不遗余力的美化我们的环境.

entry.def: If you beautify something, you make it look more beautiful.

example.ex: Claire worked to beautify the garden.

means.word_mean: 3. make more attractive by adding ornament, colour, etc.;

sentences.en: We have -fied Dalian City by improving the public gardens and parks.
sentences.cn: 我们改建园林和公园以美化大连市。

sentences.en: Her face beautified at the encouraging news.
sentences.cn: 听到那令人振奋的消息后, 她的面孔更加动人。
